=Technical Details=

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

==Patch==
 * Encryption: [http://home.comcast.net/~jwatne/aes.html AES-256] (optional, [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_Cryptography_Extension JCE] be limited to AES-128 by "Strong Jurisdiction Policy" [http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/guide/security/jce/JCERefGuide.html#AppE ref1] [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jce-6-download-429243.html ref2])
 * Compression: [http://tukaani.org/xz/java.html LZMA 2] (LZMA is used by 7-Zip)
 * Diff: [http://xdelta.org/ XDelta] (Java port by [http://sourceforge.net/projects/javaxdelta/ javaxdelta])
 * Checksum: SHA-256

==Catalog==
 * Authentication & Encryption: RSA (optional)
 * Compression: GZip (optional)
